name: Healing Roots
description:
Explore a desert canyon and complete tasks that will help bring life back to a tree.

And now a poem by ChatGPT.

The drums beat out a rhythm so bold
Solving a puzzle untold
Boulders block the way ahead
Preventing water to be shed
But with each strike and every roll
The music shifts and rocks unfold
Allowing water to seep and flow
And bring life to the roots below
The tree that once was dry and bare
Now stands tall, with leaves to share
Its roots refreshed and all aglow
Thanks to the sound that made it grow
The puzzle solved, with skill and grace
The tree now dances in its place
And all who hear the music know
The power of the drum's sweet flow.
